messages.subject: Re: speech
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/12/2005 7:53:28 PM Central Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: Well  good question.   What is speech ? A baby
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/12/2005 7:53:28 PM Central Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:

Well good question. What is "speech"?
A baby unable to make any utterance might be said to be without speech.



Speech is vocal communication.

Deaf use their hands, AND oral Deaf can REALLY use their speech quite well!!!

I speak from direct personal experience.

Pamela
Deaf with EXCELLENT speech!

Join and support the FIELD TRIPS!!! team as we walk together for N.A.A.R

_http://www.autismwalk.org/site/TR?pg=personal&fr_id=1026&px=1233441_
(http://www.autismwalk.org/site/TR?pg=personal&fr_id=1026&px=1233441)
